args_list.tensor_type: str or TensorType or None = None

params.name: tensor_type
params.description: The type of tensors to use. If str, should be one of the values of the enum [TensorType]. IfNone, no modification is done.
params.default: str or TensorType or None = None

params.name: prepend_batch_axis
params.description: Whether or not to add the batch dimension during the conversion.
